text: 3. Applications for telephone kiosks which have display panels for advertisements (whether electronic or non-electronic) and are located within 400m of a school will only be permitted where there is a condition or other agreement with the council in place to restrict the advertising of high fat, salt, and sugar (HFSS) products. 4. Applications for telephone kiosks will only be supported where they do not create a distraction hazard for road users or pedestrians, lead to excessive visual clutter in the streetscape, or create an inappropriate restriction on the amount of space available to pedestrians 214 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES Supporting text 14.171 This policy aims to ensure advertisements, hoardings and signage positively activate the streetscape and enhance the visual appearance of their host buildings or structures.
